text: The Nun is a 2018 American horror movie directed by Corin Hardy. The movie stars Demián Bichir, Taissa Farmiga, and Jonas Bloquet. It was released by Warner Bros. Pictures on September 7, 2018. It is additionally a part of The Conjuring movie universe. == Premise == A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun. == Cast == * Demián Bichir as Father Burke * Taissa Farmiga as Sister Irene * Jonas Bloquet as Frenchie * Bonnie Aarons as Valac * Ingrid Bisu as Sister Oana == Release == The movie was released by Warner Bros. Pictures on September 7, 2018. == Reception == === Critical response === On Rotten Tomatoes, the movie holds an approval rating of 27% based on 142 critic reviews with an average rating of 4.5/10. The critical consensus on the site reads "The Nun boasts strong performances, spooky atmospherics, and a couple decent set-pieces, but its sins include inconsistent logic and narrative slackness." On Metacritic, the movie has a weighted average score of 46 out of 100 based on 32 critics indicating "mixed or average reviews". Chelsea Phillips-Carr of Scene Creek scored the film a 2/5, and said "Gradually, The Nun loses interest in being a horror film". Bloody Disgusting writer Scott Weinberg praised the film and said that "There's an obvious attempt at delivering something slightly more mature than what we normally see in studio-released horror films." Empire Magazine writer Kim Newman scored the film a 3/5, and stated that "It may be a familiar old dark castle runaround, but Corin Hardy delivers eerie images and nerve- scraping sound effects." ==References== == Other websites == * Official website * The Nun on IMDb * The Nun at Rotten Tomatoes * The Nun at Metacritic Category:2018 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies set in Romania
title: The Nun (2018 movie)
